Description
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this alternate long jacket! You too can be Miss Perfect with this stylish red coat! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour C. Viper de Street Fighter IV avec cette longue veste rouge ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit dieser alternativen langen Jacke wie C. Viper aus Street Fighter IV! Mit diesem stilvollen roten Mantel bist du perfekt gekleidet! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa C. Viper di Street Fighter IV con questa giacca lunga alternativa! Anche tu puoi diventare Miss Perfezione con questo cappotto rosso! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte esta chaqueta larga alternativa y siéntete como C. Viper de Street Fighter IV! ¡Ve a la moda con esta elegante chaqueta roja! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ヴァイパーになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のロングジャケット 赤いコートであなたも今日からミズ・パーフェクト！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 바이퍼가 되는 어렌지 ver. 보디 슈트. 빨간 코트로 당신도 오늘부터 미즈 퍼팩트! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this alternate long jacket! You too can be Miss Perfect with this stylish red coat! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為C. Viper的特別版長外套。紅色大衣讓您從今天起就是完美小姐！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.
